aboutText: Senior React Native–focused Frontend Developer with 6+ years of experience building web and mobile products with React and TypeScript. At UpVisit, I delivered CMS and mobile event applications used by 10K+ users. At FruPro, we reduced Sentry-reported production bugs by ~80% within 4 months and improved performance metrics (startup time, FPS, bundle size, crash-free rate). At CargoNXT, I streamlined release workflows by implementing Sentry- and Jira-triggered agent automation and automated test workflows.
mobileApplicationDescription: Building high-performance, cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native. Focused on smooth animations, optimized bundle sizes, and crash-free user experiences at scale.
webAppDevelopDescription: Developing modern, scalable web applications with React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Delivering responsive interfaces with clean architecture, performance optimization, and production-grade reliability.
aiAgentPlaceholder: Ask me anything about Furkan's experience, skills, or projects!
